data.name: RPG Sounds - Haunted Castle - Sound Pack
data.detailed_description:
Haunted Castle is an RPG Sounds pack of looping music, ambient sounds, and SFX. It includes:

Music
  • King's Muddle
  • Mind Fog
  • Paranoid
  • Turmoil

Ambience
  • Big Room Dinner
  • Distant Footsteps

SFX
  • Drone Loss of Mind
  • Drone Vocal Delusion
  • Mistery Ominous Hit (4)
  • Wood Door Distant (3)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.12
  • Processor: SSE2 instruction set support
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 capabilities
